channel.title: How to stop whonixcheck?
channel.description:
Hey there. Sometimes I have the need to cancel the whonixcheck command. The one that start automatically. I don't want to disable the whole function, simply I want to cancel that specific whonixcheck and run it later.
How can I do that?
sudo service whonixcheck stop
Is this one the right command?
Also how can I see the progress of whonixcheck? I mean in terminal mode in the latest whonix versions it appears all together when it's been completed... in the old whonix versions I remember I was seeing whonixcheck in progress step by step...

item.title: How to stop whonixcheck?
item.dc:creator: LarryBird1
item.description:
Cause i’m in terminal and I can’t

Read full topic

item.title: How to stop whonixcheck?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Why not just press cancel?

Might also apply:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Advanced_Security_Guide#Prevent_Autostart

Read full topic

item.title: How to stop whonixcheck?
item.dc:creator: LarryBird1
item.description:
Hey there. Sometimes I have the need to cancel the whonixcheck command. The one that start automatically.
I don’t want to disable the whole function, simply I want to cancel that specific whonixcheck and run it later.

How can I do that?

sudo service whonixcheck stop

Is this one the right command?

Also how can I see the progress of whonixcheck? I mean in terminal mode in the latest whonix versions it appears all together when it’s been completed… in the old whonix versions I remember I was seeing whonixcheck in progress step by step…
